articles.author: Jill Lawless
articles.title: Starmer and Macron step up to shape European security as Trump roils relations - The Associated Press
articles.description: The leaders of Britain and France are spearheading a desperate diplomatic drive to shore up Europe’s security, bolster Ukraine’s defenses and ensure the Trump administration doesn’t seek a ceasefire on terms that reward Moscow for invading its neighbor. Prime…
